name: Remoraid

evolution.description: Remoraid can evolve into Octillery at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Jet Pokémon. This Pokémon clings to Mantine and shares in its prosperity. When its Mantine is attacked, Remoraid will fight alongside it!

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit, you may immediately gain an additional action on your turn. If this action is used to make an attack, you have disadvantage on the roll. You may only ever have one additional action per round.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: On a critical hit made by this Pokémon, triple the dice roll instead of doubling it.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: At the end of each long rest, this Pokémon rerolls on the nature table, replacing its nature with the result until the next long rest.
